textBox.richText: It’s time to train our skills at writing down data flow equations. Here is the ground rule: each exercise should not take more than one hour. (60 consecutive minutes) Do as much as you can, but stop at the end of the hour. Grading will be based on the quality of your answer regardless of how far you got. In other words - if you can get full grade with only 20% of the assignment finished -- if what you have is correct. For E1, do Exercise 2.3, page 135 of PPA. Deadline next Wednesday.
